text: Cat People is a 1942 American horror movie directed by Jacques Tourneur and starring Simone Simon, Kent Smith, Jack Holt, Tom Conway, Jane Randolph. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures and was followed by the 1944 sequel The Curse of the Cat People and was remade in 1982. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1942 movies Category:1940s horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies directed by Jacques Tourneur
title: Cat People
